name: Arima
description:
Arima is a Musical-ActionRPG which narrative and objectives are visually and sound marked. It is an Adventure set in a fantastic world that combines elements from different genres such as platforms, JRPG and puzzles. The player will live an auditory experience, where all the mechanics revolve around music, highlighting an agile combat system that combines skill, rhythm and strategy.

Features

  • Battle system characterized by rhythm.
  • Innovative mechanics based on rhythm.
  • Environmental narrative without any text.
  • Eye-catching artistic visual.
  • Meticulous and deep fantasy story.
